name: Tightrope Unicycle Master 3D HD Free
description:
Tightrope Unicycle Master 3D is "walking a tightrope Masters" series sequel, like the thrill of walking a tightrope do? Come and play on the right

Fat cable unicycle is a thrilling and exciting 3D action game balance, challenge your sense of balance limit

You need to rely on your cell phone to maintain body balance,

Steady ride unicycles to the destination,

Along the way there will be many organs and winds frustrate your balance,

Be careful!!! Accidentally falling from a tall building

But be miserable!

Friends who like the challenge of the game! Come and challenge it!


Methods of operation:

1 mobile phone is tilted forward, the characters move forward
2 mobile phone put peacetime, is the brake
3 mobile phones tilt, control balance
